CutSceneText.Text: Kobolds mine for Odium here at this spot...
Mumu Ham and his men process the Odella gathered by Skurvs, nyerk.
The processed Odium is then put in a box in Haramel Tower
Gestanerk is the only one who knows exactly where, nyerk nyerk.
My brother Moofrenerk, he knows where Gestanerk is.
Find Gestanerk if you want to draw back Haramel's dark curtain. Akakakakak!
